statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={3.4} , \displaystyle{b}={4.4}, \displaystyle{c}={7.7}, and \displaystyle{d}={8.1}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={6.2}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
